website_summaries.verdict: Individuals who need a comfy and durable pair for their water hikes may find fulfillment in this KEEN product. Moreover, its quick-drying property and trail protection may add value to those who have used it.On the other hand, the restrictive toe box of this sandal may be a reason for some to pass on it. All in all, the KEEN Newport Retro may grant satisfaction using its list of trail-worthy characteristics, as long as wearers find a pair that suits their foot width.
pros: Countless KEEN Newport Retro reviews mention that it is an astoundingly comfy sandal for hiking
A majority of buyers are happy to report that its durability meets their standards
Lots of adventurers praise the ability of this KEEN offering to dry quickly after being exposed to water
According to a bunch of customers, the Newport Retro provides adequate protection, especially around the toe area
Some trail lovers shower praises unto this outdoor sandal for its lightweight construction
A minority of users mention that the break-in period of this water hiker is close to zero
cons: Several KEEN Newport Retro owners express their disappointment over its narrow toe box
Less than a handful of purchasers detest its lack of arch support
A few shoppers state that the footgear’s opening is too small, causing annoyance when taking it on and off

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Men's sizes in a cute and colorful style!
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I will only wear only Keen shoes as their footbed always seems to fit me perfectly. Unfortunately, I usually have to buy men's shoes because they don't carry my size (12.5 -13) in ladies which means my shoes are never cute or pretty. BUT, when I came across these retro ones I was thrilled and bought them immediately! Finally some fun, colorful shoes!!! These do run small though, so I'd recommend buying 1/2 to 1 full size larger than your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but run small!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes look! The bright colors look sharp against the black. However, they run at least a half size small. I usually wear a 10 or 10.5 women's and an 8 or 8.5 men's, and the 8.5 men's was way tight, both short and narrow. I sent them back and went up to a 9, and it fits fine. However, the colors are random chance. I liked the colors on my first pair better, with more reds and blues and less yellow. They are still beautiful though. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: suigee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Female with a wide foot that reliably wears ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Female with a wide foot that reliably wears at 7.5 men’s. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable and supportive - in Technicolor!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these sandals that I purchased when Keen was a new company. I loved them but suspected that - as with most new companies - I would probably not be able to get them too far into the future. I'm so happy I was wrong. They haven't changed (except for the wonderful tie-dye version) at all with regard to comfort or quality. I've washed the old ones at least 6 times in the washing machine and they don't look any worse for it. My next pair of shoes will probably be another pair of Keens!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon G

customer_reviews.title: Fashion & Function
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!!!!!! Team Keen must have hired a fresh mind to add some vibrant color splash to accent their excellent shoes. I can't wait 'til they break out some Red Newports. The purple hue mixed in to the black sole makes these kicks truly cool. The quality, of course, is True KEEN ~ waterproof, solid construction, and amazing feel on my happy feets! They will be showstoppers when I'm groovin' at the Dead & Company Festival =D
customer_reviews.author: JOE

customer_reviews.title: *Go up at least a half size from what you normally wear. If what you normally wear is snug, maybe go up a full size.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals and have been waiting patiently for the bright tie dye pattern to come back in stock anywhere in my size. I regularly wear a women's 10 and often substitute a men's 8. After reading other reviews noting many others said they fit small and suggesting to go up a half size, I did just that and ordered a men's 8.5. They fit perfectly. I plan to wear them out in the river kayaking, so it was important to have a water sandal with a closed toe that can withstand some light hiking to/from launch sites.
customer_reviews.author: ECSEteacher

customer_reviews.title: I think I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: With all the "sales" being sent to my email inbox I thought it was time to give up on the old pair from 2015 to a new one. Too bad 8.5 seems to be a magical size and the only ones they had definitely were not on sale. So I got these. I think I like them, but they are tighter than the last 8.5 (Keen Men's Newport H2 Walking Sandal, Black,8.5 M US). As in almost a centimeter shorter front to back. They still aren't too tight, but what a surprise in the reality of the two. I'm sure the webbing or the sole didn't stretch so you'll have to take some change in stride.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: KEEN QUALITY IS UNSURPASSED!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are the absolute coolest! They fit perfectly, have great arch support, comfortable to stand or walk for long periods of time. I have two other KEEN pairs; water shoes in blue and same style as above in a Tan color. But these are Tie-Dyes' are extra special!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 10.5-11 in dress shoes. So ordered an 11. Too small - could you barely get them on. Then an 11.5, still too small - seemed worse than the 11. Next two sizes up are 12 and 13. Given my experience so far (and two returns) I'll probably have to order a size 13. Ridiculous sizing. As a check I went to the Keen site, followed their procedure (measuring foot in cm) and they said I'm an 11. The quality control has obviously gone to hell. Made in China?
customer_reviews.author: Artandscience

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a splash of color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! Seriously. The sizing is a bit wonky though. When I buy Keen boots I always find them to run small and I go with a 14 even though I would say my regular size is a 13. In these I started with a 14. My feet were swimming in the 14, exchanged for a 13, I feel like I might actually fit a 12 but I'm not going to bother. Did I mention I love the color. They're only 4 stars because the stitching inside the ankle started to come undone after only one wear. I don't expect these to be long lived, but I do love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Danger

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for me at all.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to owning a pair of these after all the rave reviews. I loved how colorful they were and I was excited to have a solid pair of sandals I could use on both land and water that would be comfortable to walk in. I may just have sensitive feet but I did not find these comfortable at all and promptly returned them. They felt like I was both walking on bricks and carrying them on my feet at the same time. Given how popular keens are, I figure I have to be an exception to the rule but if you’re prone to sensitive feet, I’d avoid these ones!
customer_reviews.author: azlv

customer_reviews.title: Eye-catching Comfort - WorldPride 2019 Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes as an early birthday gift from my One and Only specifically for WorldPride 2019 in NYC. These shoes are comfortable right out of the box, no blisters, no rubbed areas. I found that if I was wearing them for only a couple of hours, they were fine with bare feet. However, if you plan to be out and about all day, a pair of black cushion-foot no show socks makes them brilliant for the duration. Everywhere I went, people complimented these shoes and asked where I got them. I was happy to share the info. PS If you're a half-size, I'd order up.
customer_reviews.author: Tommiejay

customer_reviews.title: Found what my feet needed with these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I looked at reviews and followed suggestions to order a size larger! These sandals are not only attractive, but well made, and comfortable. I have numerous issues with neuropathy, atrophy, and foot deformity. I need generous toe box and width. Thankfully, I found what my feet need with this sandal!
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Buying Keen sandals
customer_reviews.text: I am a happy customer, with minor reservation. These multi color Newport Retro look great. Typical Keen sandal, they are a little warm, even though they are sloted for circulation. Also, take care regarding the size. I wear a 10 1/2 but bought a size 11, good decision as the 11’s fit comfortably. I intend on buying another pair and will probably buy 11 1/2’s just for a little extra room.
customer_reviews.author: GCC

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed is the best word to use
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed is the best word to use. I am a woman with very large feet-- I wear a men's 9 or a women's 11. I saw these and loved the colors, so I bought them for upcoming hiking trips. I was able to wear them right out of the box, no breaking in required. They are truly able to get wet and not get ruined. I will say they could have been a smidge wider, but I have mega wide feet so I don't know if this would be feedback to consider for others.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Burke

customer_reviews.title: ... years old and still holding up and still look good. However
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Keen Newports that are years old and still holding up and still look good. However, they are all browns and blues and boring. I LOVE these tie-dye sandals! My order arrived a few days ago and I put them on and haven't taken them off since (except grudgingly, to sleep). Keen is the best. And I just ordered the purple ones to compliment my growing colorful wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfy sandals, if ordered a 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: This tie dye design is absolutely the best. So fun. I had people asking me where I got them on the first day. They're comfortable to walk on, so far. I haven't had them too long so durability is still unknown. The only problem is that so far, they are hard to slip on. I am hoping that gets better with a little wearing in, but once they are on my feet, they feel great. MAKE SURE to order a 1/2 size up. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: G. Benedetto

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these, sad to say -- good quality, would have lasted a long time. Unfortunately, they do not have Velcro straps which would have helped me get them on and off. BOO HISS! I have such a high arch, it was a tight squeeze to get them on. Taking them off is worse. No way am I going to do that every day. IF ONLY they'd made a version with straps!!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader in the Mitten

customer_reviews.title: Longstanding Keen Fan
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, as always, with Keens. Fits perfect (for my women's 10 foot) and the hemp fabric is great look. Last leather pair like this finally began falling apart after ten years of mountains, beaches, boating and even as my dive shoes with my backstrap fins (forgot my dive boots and they worked great)! Can't think of any other footwear that would stand up to all that.
customer_reviews.author: amrobida

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Keens, nice hempy look.
customer_reviews.text: Fit like Keen Newports always have so I ordered a size up. I had been wearing Keen since they were introduced, but I stopped wearing them 5 or so years ago because Newports were looking so "mid-aughts" and the newer Keen styles are too narrow for my feet. I never found another pair of shoes to match the versatility and comfort of Keen. These are perfect -- a hip look with my favorite Newport fit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nice looking sandals
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and attractive protective sandals. I have had more compliments on these shoes than any other pair of shoes I have ever owned. People everywhere I go notice them and ask about them. I wear size 13 women’s shoes which are difficult to find. These men’s Keen shoes have been a great alternative for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandals.
customer_reviews.text: The sandals fit great. They’re very comfortable. I like that there was a fitting chart on this site. I was worried that I might be getting sandals that we’re going to be too small and tight but they fit perfect. Wear them much more than any other sandals I have ever worn. Have not worn them long enough to know how they wear though but have heard that Keen is a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Popcorn

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These feel so good on my feet! Very comfortable! I ordered .and for the width, I wear womens 10 but have wide very especially at the toes. These are wonderful I get so many compliments on my tie dye shoes. I wear tie dye shorts with them. They survived salt and fresh water on the first outing and were easily cleaned of sand and seaweed
customer_reviews.author: Ljc

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Oh joy- the shoes don't fit, but I have other Keen shoes of the same size that do... Tried to return, but UPS wouldn't accept the box, as it was wet (it was delivered to me wet). Screw it, keep the filthy money, I'll take them to Goodwill. Why does returning something have to be so painful?
customer_reviews.author: Stucco

customer_reviews.title: Do love my Keens
customer_reviews.text: The Newports are not sized correctly for men at least. I had to order a size larger but do not need a larger size in any other shoe I wear. I have a different style of Keens and they are sized correctly. Also, all of my Keens ultimately have seams that pull out on the ankle seams. I have sent a pair back before and they stand behind them, but they still have not seemed to have mastered it. Do love my Keens.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Laub

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors, high quality, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to see bright colors in men's sizes. The colors are vibrant, even though the wash. The quality is of the caliber that one would expect from Keen. Finally, they are exceedingly comfortable and stable. It's a bit chilly outside and these are still my son's go to shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Retcon

customer_reviews.title: So cute.
customer_reviews.text: I've finally found the answer to Keens that fit: Mens. Since learning that a Women's wide is just a Mens in a different size, I'm just ordering Men's Keens now and they're perfect. I just buy the smallest size, a 7. I wish they had 6 1/2, but I'll take what I can get! Now if only they'd make the Rose or Presidio in men's... :D
customer_reviews.author: T. Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Does not appear to be a men's size, though sold as such.
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this product on my feet though I have two other colors of the Keen Men's Newport H2 sandals that I tried on and bought at stores. The Retro-M sandal was both too narrow and too short. I suspect that whomever was responsible for sizing these shoes used a guide for women's, not men's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and very durable
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well and stay on when I took them into the ocean. They have a good grip on wet rock and in streams. They keep my feet cool in warm weather & don't get too stinky from all the use. They don't rub and are very comfortable. They are definitely worth the cost and I wear them often.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sandals, but poor design for fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors of the sandals. Wear 11.5 in shoes; ordered a 12 because reviews indicated the sandals ran a little small. The size 12 footbed was comfortable, but the center strap over the top of the foot has almost no flexibility and made the top far too tight. My other Keen sandals were very nice with a flexible flap that could be relaxed or tighten with the laces. The laces are almost useless here because loosening them doesn't solve the tightness of the strap over top of the foot. A size 13 might solve this, but then the footbed is too large. Really poor design for any type of size adjustment. Very sad that I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Morton

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: For years and years I've been an 11 1/2 to 12 and now with new keens I'm a size 13. Not sure what happened but its a change across their shoe line. It fits but its also wider than it used to be. Next time I'll try a different product to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Just so you know

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to order one size LARGER than you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: I live in Keen sandals. In Ajijic, Chapala, Jalisco, Mexico the weather is so fine that I live in sandals all year around. These run a tiny bit narrower than normal and one whole size smaller. But they're eye-catching and fun.
customer_reviews.author: acohenphd

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Advertised as men’s, but I adjusted to accommodate my size. The fit was a little roomy and my foot slid around when in water but had a blast wearing these in Hawaii all over vacationing, walking, snorkeling, great support walking on lava rock. Pretty sure I could walk on the moon in these! Very Comfortable, love the tie die color. Came in timeframe as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: K Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sandals for Everthing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keens are my go to sandal. This is Southern California and it’s sandal weather all year around. These can get wet and you don’t have to worry about it. I’ve got these sandals in every color available. These are worth every dollar you spend.
customer_reviews.author: J.Overdrew

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keens
customer_reviews.text: Love my Keens, fit was right , support is great, my last pair is over 5 years old and still wearable. Best sandal out there in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Toadster

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Keen sandals and shoes in general. This pair replaces a previous pair that lasted ten years! They are great for water sports. They are rugged and dry quickly and last.
customer_reviews.author: Karen WC

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but needs time
customer_reviews.text: Although size is correct, the elastic part around the ankle feels tighter than my old two pairs of same sandal. Hopefully wearing will loosen them up a bit. Otherwise, nice and unique color.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Womens too tight.  Mens width just right.
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman. I ordered the womans sandals and even with a full size up they were too tight. I returned those and ordered 1/2 size up in mens and they are perfect. These are amazingly comfortable and look great. I would buy these again in mens.
customer_reviews.author: LOIS

customer_reviews.title: Best walking around water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Keens are great water shoes. They run really wide,but I like the loose fit on my narrow feet. They have Great toe guards that save you from slamming you feet into things and tearing up. LOL
customer_reviews.author: guy hurst

customer_reviews.title: Fitment Chart
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair ordered and returned..the throat of these shoes are small,,,my standard size is 11 us..exchanged for a 12 us with the same results ...I could not get my foot into the sandal due to the small opening in the sandal..although a I own the same Keen slip on sandal that I've worn for years, these must be redesigned ?
customer_reviews.author: tbone

customer_reviews.title: Keen sandals are great!!
customer_reviews.text: I own 8 pairs of Keen Newport H2 and Keen Uneek sandals, they fit great and last forever. I wear them for everything, work, meetings, parties. The retro/rustic look and style on this particular pair is great, I will continue to purchase other colors and styles in the future.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Only for those with narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: So I would have loved to have kept these but the opening to get my foot in was way too narrow. Length was fine, just couldn't get my foot in. Went to a local shoe store and tried similar in this line. I normally wear a size 11. Had to go to a size 14 to get my foot in there. Length of a 14 was obviously way to big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Buergermeister

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could wear these as I have a very wide foot. I did have to go up a size but they are very comfortable and didn't require a break in period. I love the tie dye look. I get so many compliments every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Kirbysmom

customer_reviews.title: I wear a women’s 10 and like them wide
customer_reviews.text: What’s up? Did I order wrong? I wear a women’s 10 and like them wide, so I went with a men’s 8 and they are way to tight and hard to get on....I’m in tears because I love them! My old ones fit just fine...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby
customer_reviews.text: My husband says that these are more comfortable than any other sandal he has worn. He is 66 years old and has pain in his feet. This sandal gives him the cushion that he needs for comfort. It's his first choice in footwear since they arrived!
customer_reviews.author: Sailing-soon

customer_reviews.title: Keen Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These keen sandals fit very nicely and are nice looking. I have tried Keen sandals in the past and they fir small and narrow. These have ample room in the toe box and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: KbobK

customer_reviews.title: They looked great, and seemed really comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They looked great, and seemed really comfortable and sturdy, but the opening to put the shoe on was not stretchy, so I couldn’t even get it on my foot! The length and width seemed ok, so I’m afraid if I go up a size they will be too big:( I am super disappointed! 😔 😤
customer_reviews.author: Josselyn

customer_reviews.title: KEEN=quality
customer_reviews.text: I have an original brown pair that are still fine and are broken quite nicely that have survived many Fests and forest walks, bought these to just have another pair with a different color and to use more in the city and urban areas and these as well work great like the 1st pair and look great, gonna have both pairs til the grave baby ,]
customer_reviews.author: AL Barajas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes🏜 🥾for traveling in warm🏝⛰ 🌤🌊climate areas!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these shoes for about a week in 🇵🇦Panama! They were so comfortable and we did a lot of walking with not foot pain. Waterproof. Great shoes for a lot of summer time walking over rougher terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes G.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to these shoes. The are extremely comfortable and the tie-dye color makes the remnants of the 1960's hippie still living in me, happy. Groovy, man.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Carefull: Size up for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Upon reading reviews I chose to get 10.5 instead of the 9.5 I usually would. And they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Alan

customer_reviews.title: Abnormally Small
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 pairs of Keen Newport sandals, both size 10. I ordered these in size 10.5 because i wanted more room. I received these, the box says 10.5, the inside of the shoe says 10.5 but they are so small i can't even get my foot in them.
customer_reviews.author: Team Factoid

customer_reviews.title: Keen shoes are awesome and last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Keen shoes are awesome and last a long time. They are not the prettiest in my opinion but I own 3 pairs and will probably buy new ones when needed. If your looking for a cool, long lasting shoe/sandal that can take a beating, then this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: These particular sandals seem to run small. I normally wear a 7 in men's. I ordered these in a 7.5 and couldn't get my foot into the toe box. They are much narrower than other Keens I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: Feeling my inner hippie
customer_reviews.text: As with all Keens the fit is great and as expected and they are ridiculously comfortable. And now, with this tie dye pattern they are ridiculously fun as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Uhls

customer_reviews.title: Toe Rub
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love these. Great color. But the sandal rubbed the side of my toes. The webbing is hard and rough edged. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: FYI

customer_reviews.title: Should be certain of your size
customer_reviews.text: Wear my Keens at work (am an RN) daily. I wear them all the time. These shoes are very very comfortable allows the feet to breath. When they are muddy I throw them in washer let them dry and am on my way. Currently have 20 pairs to match my work scrubs and daily clothes. Trying to quit buying them BUT...........😏. 💯 percent satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE NAHODIL

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They have so many colors in the design that I can wear them with almost anything. They are very comfortable and, having other Keens, I know they’ll last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, great fit
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes in bright colors. Most men's shoes are in dream shades of blue, black, or brown. They got as expected and I would buy these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Lilithphoenix

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Love KEENs. However, I had to return my first pair as I normally wear an 11 men's, and the 11 was too small. I ordered the 11.5 which was on the edge of being too small, but decided to keep them. Probably should have gone with the 12. However, great quality, fast shipping, and easy returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic order half size up
customer_reviews.text: Always order a half size up. Did this time and they fit better than before. This is my second pair first pair lasted 10 years before they got ruined they were still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Nala

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and built to last
customer_reviews.text: Kind of goofy looking, but I'm getting used to it. The construction is super solid and the fit is good. Haven't gone on any long walks, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Buy a half size smaller. Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Tried a pair of keens on at academy before I bought these online. They didn’t have this style in stock. Make sure to order a half size lower than your normal tennis shoe. They fit comfortably. Great for river tubing with rocky bottoms. Also climbed a small mountain in them 1800ft.
customer_reviews.author: darrell

customer_reviews.title: Not wife enough :(
customer_reviews.text: Sandals look great and I bet would be comfortable but for me they are not wide enough. I typically wear a size 16 EE in New Balance and have a pair of size 17 Keen sneakers that fit great. These though were very narrrow in the toe area and felt like my toes were pretty cramped. Bummed because I really wanted to love these.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Oberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice but runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Liked the colors. I owned 3 other Keen sandals of same Newport model. All of them Size 8 which fitted well. I ordered a size 8 for this one and while I can still wear them, they are a tight fit but hopefully will stretch with use. So they run a bit small so do order a half size up. Amazon recommended a size 8 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dunstan

customer_reviews.title: Quality as usual from Keen
customer_reviews.text: Wearing them right now. My fifth pair of Keens, my second pair of Keen hiking sandals. Very comfortable all day long. Colors are strong.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Vasilleff

customer_reviews.title: Great solid shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, design, comfort. Had to get 1/2 size bigger than my normal size. Was still a bit snug but sole was right so decided to wear and try out. I'm happy I did. Just needs to be stretched and broken in which was no problem. I'm enjoying them!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy sandals and love love love the colors. I’m female but my wife feet often fit better in men’s shoes.
customer_reviews.author: luvspianos

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed! I generally wear a 10.5-11 and have a slightly wide foot. The 11 11 was a perfect fit. No break-in period necessary. Comfortable right out of the box. Plenty of cushioning. I am 5'10 220 lbs. Now we ewait to see how they hold up in the long term and washablity...
customer_reviews.author: frankie p

customer_reviews.title: Love the footwear!
customer_reviews.text: I went a size up and so glad that I did, they fit great! The colors are awesome! Keens make really good and sturdy footwear.
customer_reviews.author: twopets2732

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for sandals like this for awhile now
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for sandals like this for awhile now, I have very large feet for a girl. Keen only goes up to a size 11for womans, I found these and saw that they had different colors similar to the womans and bought them and am super happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfortable sandals.
customer_reviews.text: I love the tie dye color. I usually wear size 8.5, but I ordered 9. Fit is good, but if I was to order again I would get 8.5. The size as specified is correct for the fit. I had a pair of Keen H2 that I loved and I wore all the time for 12 years before the soles were wearing through, and the left foot sole glue finally broke down and the sole came off. I ordered these to replace them. So far I am extremely happy with them, and I hope they also last another 12 years :)
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Fleischman

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love...however
customer_reviews.text: These are everything that I hoped for, however, they came in a plastic bag instead of in a box. Just a little weird for $79 shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: This is just one of the things I like about ordering from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is just one of the things I like about ordering from Amazon. First pair I ordered was too small. Returned with no problem, re-ordered and within a few days had my Keene shoes in my hands and better still, on my feet! So comfortable and the support is awesome. The colors are so fun.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color of shoe. I have wide women’s feet. Some men shoes fit right and some don’t. Sent back for too small.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shoe is excellent. I had a small issue with sizing of the women/men size conversion . I wear a women’s size 9, so I first ordered men’s 7.5. It was too small and I had to return them. I re-ordered in size 8.5, and they worked. The shoe is a bit wide at the toe but I love them! The colors are exactly what I expected. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: Fun sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, fun sandals. Lots of comments on how cool the sandals look. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Scalise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and strong
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sandals, colors That I love, they are really comfortable, strong and fit just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Keens are the BEST! I love these colors. Comfortable as usual. They light up my day.
customer_reviews.author: Mostly

customer_reviews.title: Good and wide
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend as a gift. She needs wide shoes and these Keens fit great and she loves walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: MV - Orange, CA

customer_reviews.title: Keens - Great as always
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Keen sandals. Comfortable, durable, best of all for these ones colorful. Gonna love having the tie dye.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lafrenz

customer_reviews.title: Size was WAY off!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute color but the fit was WAY off! I wear a womens size 9. I ordered the mens 7.5. The size was too small for a men's shoe. Others had said the same thing so instead of a 7 I sized up to 7.5. Maybe it's the same pair that keeps getting sent out, returned, sent out....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anyone who likes tie dye will love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I think lots of colors and these are right up my alley for style I usually wear a 13 size but they seem too small I had to go to a 14
customer_reviews.author: AZ Steve

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe... lots of complements... I ware them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond D. Shattuck

customer_reviews.title: Vastly improved
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I stopped buying keems as this model in particular had a design that included a seen on piece on each side that always vame apart. This version doesn't have that design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: David Longenecker

customer_reviews.title: You have no instructions how to loosen the shoe strings .
customer_reviews.text: Cannot find how to adjust the shoe string to get the shoe on !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lavanne Lane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable. Going to wear these on all kinds of hikes and canoe trips!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I already have this shoe in leather and in the brown nylon. It fits just like they do. Super comfortable. Obviously my favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Fun sandals.
customer_reviews.text: You can't help but smile when you put these on! So bright and fun as well as the expected Keen quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: KEEN Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love the natural color; and of course the fit. This is my favorite type of sandal/shoe: breathable, versatile, comfortable, easy to keep clean, and always in style. I love the large selection of colors to choose from. Thank you, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: These are really comfortable and they look great
customer_reviews.text: The women’s size fits too small so I bought men’s. These are really comfortable and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who, after 23 years in the Navy, is embracing his inner hippie. He seldom takes them off and gets compliments all the time. They are bright and cheery and it makes me happy to see him wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Dee A. Arneson

customer_reviews.title: Bright, happy and comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! I bought a second pair for when I wear these ones out.
customer_reviews.author: RiverRat

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I like the best of the best, that’s Keen’s. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lee G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Very comfortable and tough! Amazon is the cheapest price for them! 30.00 less than REI!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Harris

customer_reviews.title: These Keens are very nice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sandals. Very comfy and good colors. True to size
customer_reviews.author: cyn

customer_reviews.title: Caution:  be prepared for stares and comments!
customer_reviews.text: These Keen Newport Retros are attention getters. People just can't keep from looking at them. YOU WILL BE NOTICED. I wear Keen shoes and boots in size 10. Same size for the sandals. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Big O

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, protective, and rad!
customer_reviews.text: Super protective and comfy. Only thing I see as a negative is they run wide and a little big. I also get a lot of sand and gravel stuck in the toe when river fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These Keen sandals are the bomb! I have had so many compliments on them.they fit perfect and are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Geaux Saints!

customer_reviews.title: great fit, cool looking
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who's seen these shoes and commented, has commented positively. Keen makes the BEST sandals of this type (at least for me). YMMV, of course!
customer_reviews.author: Henry W.

product_meta.title: Keen Men's Newport Retro-M Sandal, Hemp Dark Earth, 11 UK
product_meta.description: Small stars cover this water-friendly favorite, designed with the airiness of a sandal and the toe protection of a shoe. With its high traction shaved sole, it’s ready for all your adventures.
feature_bullets: Outer material made from washable polyester fabric
